articles.content: Heathrow has said passenger numbers were 60% lower in November than before the coronavirus pandemic and there were high cancellations among business travellers concerned about being trapped overseas … [+2439 chars]

articles.author: Helen Crane
articles.title: A THIRD are unsure whether they will be mortgage-free by retirement - This is Money
articles.description: Buying a home later than expected has meant more are heading into retirment with a mortgage - but they can still use equity from their properties to fund their later life.
articles.content:
Getting on the housing ladder later in life means a third of homeowners are now unsure whether they will be mortgage-free when they retire.
